data.title: Warning
data.content: Panic Button is a useful tool to alert your network quickly when you need help. It can't guarantee your security! Create a PACT with your network so that they are PREPARED to ACT.

data.title: Setup alert message
data.introduction: This is the message that will be sent with your location.
data.warning: Make sure your contacts know what to do if they receive this message
data.content:
Security tips

  • Consider creating a code message that only your contacts will understand
  • The message should be relevant for any situation - you won't have time to change it in a 'Panic' moment
  • Enable GPS tracking from your phone settings if you want your location to be included with the message

data.title: Setup the Disguise
data.content:
It looks like you weren't successful at opening the app from the calculator disguise.

Remember: Enter the pin code you have chosen in the first steps of the configuration. If you cannot remember your pin, please uninstall the application and reinstall it.

data.title: Test Disguise
data.introduction: Well done! Now enter your pincode to access settings.

data.title: Setup the Disguise
data.content: Panic Button stays hidden on your phone by looking like a simple calculator. From now on you will see the calculator disguise whenever you open the app. Here we teach you how to access your settings from the disguise screen.

data.title: Setup contacts
data.introduction: These are the people who will receive your alert message.
data.warning: They should know you personally and be able to respond.
data.content:
Security Tips

  • Think about who can practically assist you - there is no point someone knowing you are in trouble if they are not in a position to help you
  • Create a PACT with the contacts you choose - make sure they agree and are PREPARED to ACT
  • Be aware of the risks - how might your chosen contact be put at risk?

data.title: Set a pincode
data.introduction: This pincode is needed to access the app settings. It is not needed to alert in an emergency.
data.warning: Remember your pin! If you forget it you will need to reinstall the app.

data.title: Well done
data.content: Your test was successful! If this was a real emergency, your alert message and location would be sent to your contacts.

Remember: repeatedly press a button on the calculator fast until you feel a vibration.

data.title: Test Hardware Alarm
data.introduction: Try Now! Repeatedly press the power button fast until you feel a vibration.

data.title: Well done
data.content: Your test was successful! If this was a real emergency, your alert message and location would be sent to your contacts.

data.title: Test Disguised Alarm

data.title: Setup the Alarm
data.content: Alternatively, you can trigger the alert directly from the app's disguise screen.

data.title: Setup the Alarm
data.content: Now you will learn how to trigger Panic Button in an emergency. The app is special because it allows you to trigger the alert from the phone's power button (meaning you can do it secretly - for example, from inside a jacket pocket).
